segments.text: I observe the peaceful window view of the garden first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then my eyes go to the sink, overflowing terribly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman dries her plate meticulously, unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down the front, pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress hem is wet, but she carries on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the boy, climbing boldly on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got a plate in one hand, cookies in the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs spread wide, unstable as can be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl beside him, arm extended in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking rules, but it's innocently fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the risks pile up: slip, fall, flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic scene turned hazardous so quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang for what might go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
